Uses of Class
api.gbuild.component.GComponent

  • Packages that use GComponent 
    Package Description
    api.gbuild.component
    This package contains the implementation of simple gBuild components the generic definition of one of them, and basic containers.
    api.gbuild.component.button
    This package includes all the types of buttons that can be used to construct complex components.
    api.gbuild.component.dialog
    This package provides the implementation of movable dialogs.
    api.gbuild.component.menu
    This package offers the implementation of different types of menus.

    • Uses of GComponent in api.gbuild.component

      Subclasses of GComponent in api.gbuild.component 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GImage
      Data type defined by an PImage.
      class  GPanel
      Component that is a set of components Processing language environment does not include an implementation of a container that store primitives or figures, so it can be difficult to define a set of components that are associated between them.
      class  GText
      Component defined with a text Processing language evironment does not include an explicit data type for texts, but it offers lots of functions that allows to define properties for texts that will be drawn.
      Fields in api.gbuild.component with type parameters of type GComponent 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected List<GComponent> GPanel.components 
      protected List<GComponent> GPanel.components 
      Methods in api.gbuild.component that return GComponent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GComponent GPanel.get(int i)
      Get a component from current panel If index is not a valid position, the method would return null as a component, so do not forget to check the returned value after calling it.
      GComponent GPanel.get(int i)
      Get a component from current panel If index is not a valid position, the method would return null as a component, so do not forget to check the returned value after calling it.
      GComponent GComponent.parent()
      Get the parent for current component
      GComponent GComponent.parent()
      Get the parent for current component
      Methods in api.gbuild.component with parameters of type GComponent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GPanel.add(GComponent component)
      Add a component to current panel Panel won't allow repetitions on elements, so it is not possible to include two elements which are the same.
      void GPanel.add(GComponent component)
      Add a component to current panel Panel won't allow repetitions on elements, so it is not possible to include two elements which are the same.

      Constructor and Description
      GComponent(processing.core.PApplet manager, GComponent parent)
      Create a new gBuild component Components on gBuild can be related to another one which will be named as its parent.

    • Uses of GComponent in api.gbuild.component.button

      Subclasses of GComponent in api.gbuild.component.button 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GButton
      Component defined as a clickable button This class is the definition of a button that can be selected and incorporates an effect on which the color of a component of the button would change wether user is hovering it.
      class  GButtonClose
      Button with the shape of a close button This button is a set of components that formed an square rectangle with an x inside it that should be associated to an event for closing the component.
      class  GButtonEmpty
      Button which has no content inside This is an implementation of a button which does not include any additional component inside it.
      class  GButtonOption
      Button which is a clikable option This type of button is the equivalent of a clickable button with a text inside of it that has associated a key value.
      class  GButtonWithText
      Button with a text component This is the implementation of a button which contains a text component inside it
      Constructors in api.gbuild.component.button with parameters of type GComponent

    • Uses of GComponent in api.gbuild.component.dialog

      Subclasses of GComponent in api.gbuild.component.dialog 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GDialog
      Dialog component which is movable This class was designed to offer to developers an easy way to build dialogs that can incorporate to its content lots of different components.
      class  GDialogWithText
      Dialog that contains a text as the content This dialog includes at the bottom part of the component a text passed by the developer.

    • Uses of GComponent in api.gbuild.component.menu

      Subclasses of GComponent in api.gbuild.component.menu 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GMenu
      Menu formed by a set of options This is the implementation of a menu that contains lots of options that are clickable and are associated to a key value which actives an event.
      class  HorizontalGMenu
      Horizontal Menu with clickable options This class is the implementation of a menu with clickable options that are distributed horizontally.
      class  VerticalGMenu
      Vertical Menu with clickable options This class is the implementation of a menu with clickable options that are distributed vertically.
